title: PSA: Let your team carry
body: When you have a teammate struggling to carry you and is single-handedly keeping you in the game, the least you can do is not surrender.  That player is doing whatever they can to win and may very well do so, but robbing them of that opportunity not only is infuriating and unfair to them but also loses you some free LP and MMR.

replies.body: Or at the very least, stop spamming surrender votes. Shit just gets in the way and can easily cost a vital bit of attention.
